properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 1 at 2:15PM MST until February 4 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18
inches.

* WHERE...Red Lodge Foothills and Beartooth Foothills.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 5 AM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult or impossible due to
snowy and slick roads, and poor visibility. Be ready for several
inches of fresh snow cover for your Monday morning commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY
